description.lang: The Doorlock is a replacement lock for any door that allows you to enter and exit using an RFID chip in various forms (ring, card, wristband, etc.), your mobile device through Bluetooth, and your home security system through Z-Wave. The lock tracks who goes in and out and allows you to monitor its events through an easy-to access history log. It is easily installed with two screws and a snap connector, and includes a latch that can be adjusted to fit almost any door. It's persistent lock feature ensures you never forget to lock your door, and can be toggled on or off depending on the use case. Finally, a reliable security solution for your home or office!
Group 1 (Lifeline) sends reports for these command classes: COMMAND_CLASS_DEVICE_RESET_LOCALLY, COMMAND_CLASS_BATTERY, COMMAND_CLASS_NOTIFICATION, COMMAND_CLASS_DOOR_LOCK
